info.title: Seed Model Service API
info.description: The Seed Model Service API provides a series of endpoints for functionalities such as text generation, conversation, vector embedding, image generation, and video generation.

servers.description: Seed Model Service API Base URL

post.description: Used to generate text responses and conduct conversations with text generation models and visual understanding models.
Convert text content into vectors for tasks such as semantic retrieval and text analysis.

input: 火山方舟提供强大的AI能力。

post.description: Convert video, image, and text content into vectors for multimedia content processing scenarios such as image search and semantic retrieval.
Generate images based on text prompts.
Create asynchronous video generation tasks based on text descriptions (text-to-video) or combined with images (image-to-video).

get.description: Query the list of video generation tasks that meet specific criteria. Only data from the last 7 days can be queried.

parameters.name: page_num
parameters.description: Page number of the returned results, range [1, 500]

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number of results returned per page, range [1, 500]

parameters.name: filter.status
parameters.description: Filter parameter for querying tasks with specific statuses

parameters.name: filter.task_ids
parameters.description: Video generation task IDs for exact search. Multiple task IDs can be passed, connected with &

parameters.name: filter.model
parameters.description: Inference endpoint ID used by the task, for exact search

get.description: Query the status and result of a specific video generation task.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the video generation task to query

delete.summary: Cancel or Delete Video Generation Task
delete.description: Cancel or delete a specific video generation task.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the video generation task to cancel or delete

bearerAuth.description: Provide the API Key via the Authorization header. Format: `Bearer YOUR_API_KEY`

prompt_tokens.description: Number of tokens in the prompt

completion_tokens.description: Number of tokens in the completion

total_tokens.description: Total number of tokens used (prompt + completion)

model.description: ID of the model or inference endpoint to call. You need to activate the model service and query the ID first.

messages.description: List of conversation messages, including historical conversation information.

url.description: URL or Base64 encoding of the image

content.description: Content of the message, which can be a string or an array of multimodal content

name.description: Name of the message, used to distinguish different messages

tool_call_id.description: ID of the tool call, used when the role is 'tool'

stream.description: Whether to return the response in streaming mode. true for streaming, false for one-time return.

stream_options.description: Configuration options for streaming responses, effective when stream is true.

chunk_include_usage.description: Return cumulative usage for each chunk

max_tokens.description: Maximum length of the model's response (in tokens). Different models have different upper limits.

max_completion_tokens.description: Controls the maximum length of the model's output (including thought chain and response content). Mutually exclusive with max_tokens.

temperature.description: Sampling temperature, controlling randomness. Range [0, 2]. It is recommended to adjust only one of temperature or top_p.

response_format.description: Specifies the format of the model's output content.

schema.description: Defines the structure of JSON when type is json_schema

tools.description: List of tools for Function Calling functionality.

parameters.description: JSON Schema definition of function parameters

tool_choice.description: Controls how the model uses tools. 'auto' means the model can independently choose whether to use tools, 'none' means not to use tools.

seed.description: Random seed, used to control the randomness of generated content.

model.description: Name and version of the model used for this request

created.description: Unix timestamp (in seconds) when the completion was created

choices.description: Array of completion choices. Usually contains only one element unless specified otherwise.

index.description: Index of the choice in the array

role.description: Role of the message, always 'assistant' for responses

content.description: Content of the message. Can be null when using tools.

tool_calls.description: Array of tool calls if the model decides to call tools

finish_reason.description: Reason why the model stopped generating

logprobs.description: Log probabilities of tokens if requested

model.description: Name and version of the model used for this request

created.description: Unix timestamp (in seconds) when the completion was created

object.description: Object type, always 'chat.completion.chunk' for streaming responses

choices.description: Array of completion choices. Usually contains only one element unless specified otherwise.

index.description: Index of the choice in the array

role.description: Role of the message, always 'assistant' for responses

content.description: Incremental content of the message. Can be null when using tools.

tool_calls.description: Array of incremental tool calls if the model decides to call tools

index.description: Index of the tool call in the array

arguments.description: Incremental JSON string of function parameters

finish_reason.description: Reason why the model stopped generating, provided in the last chunk

usage.description: Provided only in the last chunk of the stream, if stream_options.include_usage is true

model.description: ID of the model or inference endpoint to call

input.description: Model input, which can be a string, an array of strings, or an object

stream.description: Whether to return the response in streaming mode

model.description: Name and version of the model used for this request

created.description: Unix timestamp (in seconds) when the response was created

output.description: Output of the model, format depends on the model

model.description: ID of the model or inference endpoint to call

input.description: List of texts to convert into vectors

model.description: Name and version of the model used for this request

embedding.description: Array of floats representing the text embedding

index.description: Position of this embedding in the input array

prompt_tokens.description: Number of tokens in the prompt

model.description: ID of the model or inference endpoint to call

input.description: List of multimodal content to convert into vectors

image.description: URL or Base64 encoding of the image, used when type is image

text.description: Text content, used when type is text

model.description: Name and version of the model used for this request

embedding.description: Array of floats representing the multimodal content embedding

index.description: Position of this embedding in the input array

prompt_tokens.description: Number of tokens in the prompt

model.description: ID of the model or inference endpoint to call, currently only doubao-seedream-3-0-t2i-250415 is supported

prompt.description: Text description used to generate the image

size.description: Size of the generated image, in the format 'widthxheight'

seed.description: Random seed, used to control the randomness of generated content

created.description: Unix timestamp (in seconds) when the image was created

url.description: URL of the generated image, provided when response_format is url

b64_json.description: Base64 encoding of the generated image, provided when response_format is b64_json

revised_prompt.description: Revised prompt if the original prompt was modified

model.description: ID of the model or inference endpoint to call

prompt.description: Text description used to generate the video

negative_prompt.description: Negative prompt, specifying content not desired in the generated video

image.description: Image URL or Base64 encoding for image-to-video generation

callback_url.description: Callback URL, a POST request will be sent to this URL after the task is completed

duration.description: Duration of the generated video (in seconds)

resolution.description: Resolution of the generated video, e.g., '512x512'

ratio.description: Aspect ratio of the generated video, e.g., '1:1'

framepersecond.description: Frame rate of the generated video

seed.description: Random seed, used to control the randomness of generated content

id.description: Unique identifier for the video generation task

model.description: Name and version of the model used for this request

error.description: Error information returned when the task fails, null when successful

created_at.description: Unix timestamp (in seconds) when the task was created

updated_at.description: Unix timestamp (in seconds) when the task status was last updated

content.description: Output when the task is successful, containing the download URL of the generated video

video_url.description: URL of the generated video. Note: For information security, the generated video will be cleaned up after 24 hours, please save it in time.

seed.description: Seed integer value used for this request

ratio.description: Aspect ratio of the generated video

duration.description: Duration of the generated video (in seconds)

framepersecond.description: Frame rate of the generated video

usage.description: Token usage information for this request

id.description: Unique identifier for the video generation task

model.description: Name and version of the model used for this request

error.description: Error information returned when the task fails, null when successful

created_at.description: Unix timestamp (in seconds) when the task was created

updated_at.description: Unix timestamp (in seconds) when the task status was last updated

content.description: Output when the task is successful, containing the download URL of the generated video

video_url.description: URL of the generated video. Note: For information security, the generated video will be cleaned up after 24 hours, please save it in time.

seed.description: Seed integer value used for this request

ratio.description: Aspect ratio of the generated video

duration.description: Duration of the generated video (in seconds)

framepersecond.description: Frame rate of the generated video

usage.description: Token usage information for this request

total.description: Total number of tasks matching the filter criteria

items.description: List of found video generation tasks
